file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 22-11-01-04 - FLIGHT GUIDANCE CONTROLLER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FLIGHT GUIDANCE CONTROLLER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the Flight Guidance Controller (GC-550). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FLIGHT GUIDANCE CONTROLLER ALL 22-11-01-000-801-A (GC-550) - REMOVAL FLIGHT GUIDANCE CONTROLLER ALL 22-11-01-400-801-A (GC-550) - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 22-11-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 22-11-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FLIGHT GUIDANCE CONTROLLER (GC-550) - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the Flight Guidance Controller (GC-550). B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223AZ Glareshield panel C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Glareshield panel H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open these circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them. (a) PUSH BUTTONS (Location Tip: DC BUS 2 / LIGHTS). (b) PILOT PANEL (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1 / LIGHTS). (c) AP 1 (Location Tip: DC BUS 1 / FLIGHTS CONTROLS). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Loosen the Dzus fasteners (1) (4 positions). (2) Carefully pull GC-550 (2) from its housing to get access to the electrical connector (3). (3) Disconnect the electrical connector (3) from GC-550 (2). (4) Install protection caps on the electrical connector (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 22-11-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Flight Guidance Controller (GC-550) - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 223 224 B DET. A 2. GC-550 1. DZU FASTENER (4) DET. B C 3. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR FLIGHT GUIDANCE CONTROLLER (GC-550) FD1 HDG NAV AP SPD FLC ALT FD2 CRS 1 HDG SPD ASEL CRS 2 APR CPL VS BNK YD PUSH SYNC PUSH SYNC PUSH IAS/M PUSH SYNC DET. C 145AMM220037.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 22-11-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 22-11-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. FLIGHT GUIDANCE CONTROLLER (GC-550) - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the Flight Guidance Controller (GC-550). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AUTOPILOT GO-AROUND MODE - OPERATIONAL AMM TASK 22-11-00-700-801-A/500 CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223AZ Glareshield panel D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Glareshield panel I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Remove the protection caps from the electrical connector (3). (2) Hold GC-550 (2) and connect the electrical connector (3). (3) Carefully install GC-550 (2) in its housing. (4) Tighten the Dzus fasteners (1) (4 positions). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close these circuit breakers and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them. (a) PUSH BUTTONS (Location Tip: DC BUS 2 / LIGHTS). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 22-11-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) PILOT PANEL (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1 / LIGHTS). (c) AP 1 (Location Tip: DC BUS 1 / FLIGHTS CONTROLS). (2) Do the operational check of the Autopilot Go-Around Mode ( AMM TASK 22-11-00-700-801-A/500).
